name: AFGBuildableFoundation
comment: A foundation to build your factory walls and floors on.

properties.name: mSize
properties.comment: Size of the foundation (size of one side of the square).

properties.name: mHeight
properties.comment: Height of the foundation. Origo is assumed to be half way between.

properties.name: mElevation
properties.comment: Elevation of this foundation if ramp, assumes the ramp to go down towards a positive X.
